testcase.name: testGameOver

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: The game ends when as the head of the snake collides with the rest of the snake. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✓ --------------- OO>A.. | OO>A.. ...... | ...... ...... | ......
step=1, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ --------------- .OO>.. | .OO>.. ...A.. | ...A.. ...... | ......
step=2, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ --------------- .OOO>. | .OOO>. ...A.. | ...A.. ...... | ......
step=3, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ --------------- .OOOO> | .OOOO> ...A.. | ...A.. ...... | ......
step=4, rand=6, actions=<ChangeDir(South()), Step> Want | Got ✓ --------------- .OOOOO | .OOOOO ...A.v | ...A.v ...... | ......
step=5, rand=6, actions=<ChangeDir(West()), Step> Want | Got ✓ --------------- ..OOOO | ..OOOO ...A<O | ...A<O ...... | ......
step=6, rand=6, actions=<ChangeDir(North()), Step> Want | Got ✗ -------------------------- GameOverDisplay() | ...O^O | ...AOO | ......

testcase.name: testNoEscapeGameOver

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: The snake should not move anymore after the game is over, hence it should not be possible to “escape” from a game over by moving though the snake. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✓ ------------- OO>A. | OO>A. ..... | ..... ..... | ..... ..... | .....
step=1, rand=0, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- AOO>. | AOO>. ..... | ..... ..... | ..... ..... | .....
step=2, rand=0, actions=<ChangeDir(South()), Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- AOOO. | AOOO. ...v. | ...v. ..... | ..... ..... | .....
step=3, rand=0, actions=<ChangeDir(West()), Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------- AOOO. | AOOO. ..<O. | ..<O. ..... | ..... ..... | .....
step=4, rand=0, actions=<ChangeDir(North()), Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------- GameOverDisplay() | AO^O. | ..OO. | ..... | .....
step=5, rand=0, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------------------------------- GameOverDisplay() | GameOverDisplay()
